name: AI Sight Modifications
description: Provides multiple options for adjusting the vision of NPCs and Cameras, including disabling them outright.

options.name: Blind
options.tooltip: NPCs are blind and cannot see anything or spot you based on sight alone. This does not prevent AI from spotting you due to omniscience. (Does not affect Haven Island)

options.name: Standard (Vanilla)
options.tooltip: NPCs have default vision and can see you and objects in the world from their standard ranges. (Does not affect Haven Island)

options.name: Doubled
options.tooltip: NPCs have doubled vision range and can see you and objects in the world from farther distances, as is standard on Haven Island. (Does not affect Haven Island)

options.name: Blind
options.tooltip: NPCs are blind and cannot see anything or spot you based on sight alone. This does not prevent AI from spotting you due to omniscience. (Only affects Haven Island)

options.name: Standard

options.name: Normal (Vanilla)
options.tooltip: Cameras have standard vision and can see/spot you.
